text: BEST CHICKEN IN CONCORD. The friendly faces of the employees and the homie atmosphere makes for a great combination in this local eatery. While still containing many of the necessities we all need in real life this place provides good tasting food at a low price. The staff prepapres all the food by hand everyday and really care about their customers which is obvious by the way theu interact with them. A neighborhood establishment for over thirty years, Danny's chicken is keeping the tradition of good food at low prices alive and well.
This is my favorite store in town so far. Its right up the street from my house and the wedges are good .
Cheap tasty wings and wedges. I accidentally found it yesterday. Will definitely go back. Customer service is great.
